name: @abiyub/ethiowds
description: Ethiopian Web Design System - A comprehensive design system for Ethiopian government websites

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:assets && npm run verify-build
scripts.build:assets: gulp build-assets || echo 'No gulp build-assets command'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/assets
scripts.verify-build: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (!fs.existsSync('dist/css/ethio-wds.css')) { console.error('❌ CSS build failed!'); process.exit(1); } if (!fs.existsSync('dist/js/ethio-wds.js')) { console.error('❌ JS build failed!'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ Build verified: CSS and JS files exist');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run verify-build
